titleStmt.title: Mr. Coleman's two letters to Monsieur L'Chaise, the French king's confessor with Monsieur L'Chaise's answer to Mr. Coleman, which the House of Commons desired might be printed : together with the D. of Y's letter to the said Monsieur L'Chaise, which sheweth what Mr. Coleman wrote to him, was by his special command and appointment.
Two letters to Monsieur L'Chaise
titleStmt.author: Coleman, Edward, d. 1678.

Two letters to Monsieur L'Chaise
titleStmt.author: Coleman, Edward, d. 1678.
La Chaise, François d'Aix de, 1624-1709.
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.
